column4: I have a logitech dinovo mini keyboard. There are some buttons on the keyboard which have no effect when i press them such as the zoom buttons for example. How can i map the zoom button on the keyboard to the zoom function in ubuntu?
If they explain how to get xbindkeys working here, that'd be a good method.
'xbindkeys' is a daemon that's made to do what you're talking about.
But I'm here because it just broke with the update to 11.04...
